posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment 代码高亮C++代码123456#include <iostream>int main(int argc, char* argv[]) { std::cout << "C++ code" << std::endl; return 0;} Scala代码12345object Printer { def main(args: Array[String]): Unit = { println("Scala Code") }} 数学公式当$a \ne 0$, 满足数学公式$$ax^2 + bx + c = 0$$ 的情况下，那么$$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}$$
